来季: (らいき) - next semester; next session; next season; next year
来学: (らいがく) - coming to school; coming to university
来宅: (らいたく) - coming of a visitor to one's home
来客攻め: (らいきゃくぜめ) - flood of visitors
来客用: (らいきゃくよう) - for visitors or guests
来客芳名録: (らいきゃくほうめいろく) - guest book
来局: (らいきょく) - coming to a post office, broadcasting station, etc.
来島: (らいとう) - arriving on an island
来年の事を言うと鬼が笑う: (らいねんのことをいうとおにがわらう) - (proverb) Nobody knows the morrow; speak of next year and the demons laugh
来年度: (らいねんど) - next year; next fiscal year
来庁: (らいちょう) - coming to a prefectural office, etc.
来店: (らいてん) - coming to the store
来征: (らいせい) - coming from far away to participate in a game, war, etc.
来所: (らいしょ) - (appropriate for any place ending with 〜所) coming to an office, laboratory, etc.
来掛かる: (きかかる) - to happen to come
来掛け: (きがけ) - (usu. adverbially as 来がけに)  on the way here
来方: (きかた) - the way (to somewhere); how to reach (a place)
来日: (らいにち) - arrival in Japan; coming to Japan; visit to Japan
来旨: (らいし) - gist of what someone else said; purpose of a visit
来月号: (らいげつごう) - next month's issue
来月末: (らいげつすえ) - end of next month
来朝: (らいちょう) - arriving in Japan; visiting Japan
来来週: (らいらいしゅう) - week after next
来次第: (きしだい) - as soon as (he, she, it) comes
来泊: (らいはく) - coming to stay over; coming to spend the night
来牒: (らいちょう) - correspondence; received letter or note
来県: (らいけん) - coming to a prefecture
来社: (らいしゃ) - visit to a company
来福: (らいふく) - visiting Fukuoka; coming to Fukuoka
来秋: (らいしゅう) - next autumn; next fall
来者: (らいしゃ) - visitor; person born later than oneself/one's junior; future
来聴: (らいちょう) - attendance; audience; coming to listen
来臨: (らいりん) - attendance; presence; visit; coming; advent
来航: (らいこう) - arrival of ships; arrival by ship
来観者: (らいかんしゃ) - visitor (to an exhibit)
来訪神: (らいほうじん) - joy-bringing spirit from the divine realms
来訪者: (らいほうしゃ) - client; visitor; caller
来話: (らいわ) - coming to talk; conversation one came (to a place) to have
来謁: (らいえつ) - visiting and meeting somebody (of higher status)
来貢: (らいこう) - coming to pay tribute
来賀: (らいが) - your coming; coming with happy news; your presence
来賓演説者: (らいひんえんせつしゃ) - guest speaker
来賓講演者: (らいひんごうえんしゃ) - guest speaker
来路: (らいろ) - traveled road; road somebody came along
来車: (らいしゃ) - your coming; your visiting me
来迎: (らいごう) - the coming of Amida Buddha to welcome the spirits of the dead
来迎和讃: (らいごうわさん) - Japanese hymn praising the coming of the Buddha (thought to be written by Minamoto No Makoto)
来迎柱: (らいごうばしら) - round pillars each side of the wall behind a shumidan dais
来週の今日: (らいしゅうのきょう) - this day next week; today week; a week from today
来降: (らいこう) - advent; descent (of a god)
来院: (らいいん) - visit to a hospital, temple, school, etc.
来集: (らいしゅう) - coming together; gathering and coming
来館: (らいかん) - coming to an embassy, theatre, library, etc.
来駕: (らいが) - your coming; coming with happy news; your presence
杪春: (びょうしゅん) - end of spring
杪欏: (ヘゴ) - Cyathea spinulosa (species of tree fern)
杪秋: (びょうしゅう) - end of autumn (fall)
